Title: Pictures of four seasons in the rural village (1)
Designer: Xu Yongxiang (徐永祥)Lin Kangnian (林康年)Wu Delong (吳德隆)Yao Qiaoyun (姚巧云)
Publisher: Huadong renmin meishu chubanshe (华东人民美术出版社)
Notes: First of four scrolls showing a rural village during the four seasons. This is spring. Peasants are spraying pesticide, preparing tools, distributing fertilizer, plowing the fields and planting.
